programme.desc: Key and Jenna were dating for a year before inviting another woman named Kayla to the mix.

programme.sub-title: Did My Mom Trade Me for Drugs? Part 1

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Fought My Identical Twin Sister; DNA Mystery: Dad, Stop Ghosting Me
programme.desc: After years of pain and anger, Brianna says, her mother, Rosemary, attempted to stab her and run over her with a car; Loni doesn't approve of his video vixen girlfriend Shanice's attire and says he can't trust her around men.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Surprise Special Guest; Sometimes I Hate My Daughter!
programme.desc: Marcus has doubts about being the father of Rashell's daughter after hearing rumors about Rashell being seen with different men, and Maury Povich helps put an end to the DNA mystery; Torianna says her mother abused her as a child.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Truth: He's A Jailbird / Unlock: 14 Years Of Marriage Lies? (new)
programme.desc: Samonia wants to mend her friendship with Leslie after criticizing her partners. Meanwhile, Kalondra left her husband Anthony due to lies, but he’s trying to win her back. Karamo helps by unlocking both their phones to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Child’s Father Won’t Accept My Transition
programme.desc: Karamo explores the joys and challenges that come with being a member of the LGBTQ community.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Want a Family, Marry Me/ Unlock The Phone: Give Me a Title
programme.desc: Tray discovered some inappropriate text messages between his girlfriend, Olivia, and other men from her past.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Prove That You're Not Cheating with my Cousin
programme.desc: Sylvia thinks her cousin dresses very provocatively and based on their transgressions, is very suspicious.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Truth: You Know He's Your Son; "You Shook My Daughter's Casket!"
programme.desc: After Kaleya's child was born, Dashaun vanished and denies being the father; Dora caused a scene at her niece's funeral and tells people that her sister is the reason the child is no longer alive.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Saw the Video...You Cheated With a Stripper!
programme.desc: Maury’s guests are sick and tired of their men cheating on them. Can Maury find out the truth and will these relationships survive? Tune in today!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Cheated with my Twin Brother...is he Our Baby's Dad?
programme.desc: SP is back on the show and his brother denies Tiffany’s baby. They claim the father is her 80 year old co-worker! Then, Ally is sure that Anna’s mother put a voodoo curse on him! The results are in on the next Maury!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I've Tested 8 Men … I Think Your Husband Is The Father!
programme.desc: Mothers return after multiple appearances to test more men in order to find out once and for all who the fathers of their children are.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With 100 Men! Who's My Baby's Father?
programme.desc: Veronica says Marcus denies her 2 month old daughter because his mother says he can't have kids. Then, Randy left Amy when she was 4 1/2 months pregnant with their child for another woman.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Not Cheating ... I'm Just Too Old and Tired for Sex!
programme.desc: Carrie thinks her boyfriend has cheated on her over 150 times. Then, a couple only has sex 5 times a year and she thinks it's because he is cheating. Plus, Julio finds out his wife has cheated and now he's terrified that his son is not his.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Brother-In-Law My Baby's Father?
programme.desc: Josh has overcome a physical disability to become a dad. He say's that it will kill him if he finds out he's not the father. Jason and his fiance both deny Elizabeth's baby. Then, a lesbian couple, 2 denying dads and 2 babies caught in the middle.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 6 Moms Return ... Will They Find Their Babies' Dads Today?
programme.desc: Today on MAURY ... you heard their wild paternity stories. The results shocked you. Now these guests are back with more paternity mysteries to be solved. Will these women finally find the true fathers of their children, or will these men prove their not the real dads? Don't miss one second of the wild paternity drama on today's MAURY!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Outrageous Merry Maury Updates!
programme.desc: Maury is celebrating the holidays with stories of past guests that came for tests, lie detectors and more.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Test Him...Is My Daughter's Fiance A Male Prostitute?
programme.desc: Kazia is 6 months pregnant and she's terrified that her fiance fresh is not only cheating on her, but that he may be a male prostitute. Will Fresh pass the test or be left out in the cold?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: If You Cheated In Our Bed … The Wedding is Off!
programme.desc: First, Meggan suspects her fiance, Kevin, is cheating on her when she finds sex toys that do not belong to her. Than, Michelle worries her man is checking out more than books at the library.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 8 Possible Fathers ... Who Will Be The Dad?
programme.desc: These babies need fathers and only MAURY has the answers these women are desperate to hear. Will he prove these women right and make these men finally accept responsibillty? Or, will the results leave these moms with even more unanswered questions.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: 43 Months
programme.desc: Robert says he loaned the defendant money and she agreed to pay $100 a month in late fees until the loan was paid off, but took 43 extra months to pay it.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Tree-Trimming Turmoil
programme.desc: Karen Steinhaus sues landscaper Don for $1,500, claiming he took her money but never completed yard work or removed a tree. Don, with 35 years of experience, counters that he did most of the job and delays were weather-related.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Abandoned by Her Father
programme.desc: Anissa Williams sues her dad, Nathaniel Green, for $5,000, claiming he owes her money despite the heartbreak. Nathaniel argues the money was family kindness and countersues for $1,000 for slander.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Feuding Friends
programme.desc: Desta Krupa sues neighbor Marie for $571.67, claiming she’s stuck paying for an Xbox and iPod bought on her line of credit. Marie counters, blaming payment issues on the credit company and says the iPod was a gift.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Hair Extension Disaster
programme.desc: Plaintiff Diane Hernandez sues stylist Nikki Banks for $2,175, saying hair extensions caused scalp damage. Nikki denies fault, blaming Diane for wetting the tape. Nikki countersues for $500, citing defamation and a drop in her social media rating.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Workplace Warfare
programme.desc: Andrew is accusing his ex boss of assault and demands retribution for his back pain after the attack.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I’ll Unlock My Phone To Prove My Innocence
programme.desc: Brianna wants to work things out after catching her boyfriend Taylor in bed with another woman!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The DNA Truth – Is That My Child? / Help, My Daughters Hate Me
programme.desc: Nyrita has a tumultuous relationship with her daughters. They claim their mother refuses any accountability.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Husband Has a Gambling Addiction
programme.desc: Shawntia has over $13,000 worth of debt because of her husband, Ian’s gambling obsession!
